divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside at the park playing with my grandpa and sister. I first noticed the object when it started to get very bright outside and my phone started to buzz when I was having no calls or nothing. At first i thought it was a weather balloon before all those weird and strange things started to happen.The object looked like a weather balloon on steroids. It moved mostly forward and hovered. I was in complete shock and surprise. I tried to take a picture but it was moving to fast. I lost sight of the object when it zipped on past the horizon.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in O'Fallon
There were no other sightings in O'Fallon on or around October 1st 2013
Summary: It flew faster than any airplane or helicopter i have ever seen
Object Flight Path: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
